name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a knowledgeable Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience, I excel in **Azure** cloud architecture and governance, leveraging **Infrastructure as Code** tools like **Terraform**, **ARM Templates**, and **Bicep** to design and implement highly secure cloud solutions. I possess a solid understanding of **Zero-Trust Security**, utilizing **Defender for Cloud** and **Sentinel** to enhance security compliance and risk management. I am well-versed in developing **Cloud-First Strategies** and leading migration projects while ensuring adherence to security and compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. 
In addition, my background as a Full Stack Developer enables me to bring insights into the integration of modern technologies, including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, as well as frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. This unique blend of skills enriches my ability to contribute effectively to dynamic enterprise environments, ensuring robust, high-performance applications. I am bilingual in **German** and **English**, enhancing collaboration in diverse teams.
